name: Vietnam visa online
short_description:
Like other countries as Cambodia, India, Indonesia, China... Vietnam has allowed visa agencies to arrange visa for their customers on their behalf. Previously, only travellers booking a tour to Vietnam can have their visa arranged by tour company which must possess an international tour operator license. Since 2005, the new law has changed the format of visa on arrival - making it easier to obtain than before.
Vietnam visa on arrival (so called pre-arranged visa, e-visa, landing visa or online visa) is one of the fastest and cheapest way to get a visa for Vietnam. People just need to fill in a online application secured form, pay the service fee and wait to get the "Visa approval letter" within 2 working days (normal processing) or 2 hours (emergency processing), in working days or at weekend or holidays then pick up a visa at destination airports in Vietnam (Hanoi airport, Ho Chi Minh city airport or Danang airport).
http://www.e-vietnamvisa.com; http://www.vietnamvisabooking.com
summary: Vietnam visa on arrival, which can be applied online totally
